s_romset_title: Star Wars - TIE Fighter - Collector's CD-ROM (USA)
as_mdata_screen_titles: [usa] Star Wars - Tie Fighter - Collectors' CD-ROM
s_mdata_differences:
+ Includes the three campaigns from the add-on "Star Wars - TIE Fighter - Defender of the Empire".
+ Includes three new campaigns in a second add-on called "Enemies of the Empire".
+ Improved screen resolution to SVGA (640x480).
+ Added new cut scenes.
+ Full voice mission briefings and radio calls.
+ Improved the interactive mission briefing.
